abstract: Information released by the bank will probably push regulators in the United States and Britain to take a close look at the JPMorgan traders involved with a mounting loss on a disastrous bet.
snippet: Information released by the bank will probably push regulators in the United States and Britain to take a close look at the JPMorgan traders involved with a mounting loss on a disastrous bet.
lead_paragraph: The investment fiasco that has cost JPMorgan Chase nearly $6 billion to date has evolved to the point that it may seem like Christmas to regulators.

headline.main: JPMorgan’s Fiasco Presents New Avenues to Investigate

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: Office of the Comptroller of the Currency

byline.original: By Peter J. Henning and Steven Davidoff Solomon
